templates.name: How do I apply my reward points to an order?
templates.content:
When you're placing an order, you'll be able to apply your rewards points directly during checkout under the order summary section! Just make sure you're logged in first to see and use your points at checkout. When redeeming points, minimum purchases do apply.

- When redeeming 75 points ($5), you must spend at least $10 before applying your points.
- When redeeming 150 points ($10), you must spend at least $15 before applying your points.
- When redeeming 300 points ($20), you must spend at least $25 before applying your points.

Let me know how that goes!

templates.name: Can you engrave this?
templates.content: Unfortunately, we don't offer any engraving or imprinting services at this time.

templates.name: How do I get the subscription and trial?
templates.content: You might be referring to Study Gateway - this is our sister brand that offers a subscription for video bible studies, plus a 7-day free trial is offered. Check it out here: www.studygateway.com

templates.name: Do you take prayer requests?
templates.content: Our role as customer service agents is to help with technical issues you encounter on our website or questions regarding our products. While we do pray for our customers, we encourage you to contact someone locally, like a pastor or priest, with any specific prayer requests.

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: Our warehouse is located in La Porte, Indiana.

templates.name: Tax exemption
templates.content: You can send an email with your state tax-exempt certificate attached to customercare@harpercollins.com. You can also open a chat with one of our representatives on the website and upload the form there.

templates.name: Where do I find my access code?
templates.content: For study guides with streaming videos, please look for your code printed on the inside front cover of your study guide. You may have to scratch off the foil covering to reveal the code underneath. Let me know how it goes!

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at customercare@harpercollins.com Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Where can I read my e-book?
templates.content: Once you've redeemed your e-book, you can read it on your computer, smartphone, tablet, or smartphone, through Glose. Read your e-book on all iOS devices (iPhone, iPad) and all Android devices. Alternatively, you can read on a Kindle Fire through Glose.com on your web browser. Unfortunately, you cannot read your e-book on an e-ink reader like Kindle or Nook.

templates.name: What is Glose?
templates.content: Glose is a next-generation eBook and audiobook experience. Glose is a website (www.glose.com) and a free mobile application for iOS and Android that allows you to read eBooks and/or listen to audiobooks purchased from us, Faithgateway.com. After purchasing from our site, your eBook or audiobook will be available to read or listen through your computer on www.glose.com as well as from your smartphone or tablet through the Glose app. Please visit www.glose.com to learn more.

templates.name: What is the audio quality of my downloaded audio book?
templates.content: Downloaded audio books are 64-Kpbs MP3 files.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at (800) 834-7828 (Mon-Fri, 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM CST) or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $35+. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: How do I watch the online Bible study videos for the one I purchased?
templates.content: Thank you for waiting! Please look on the very first page of your study guide once you receive it. You will find an access code for the streaming videos and instructions for redeeming it on our Study Gateway platform.

templates.name: Can I read my e-books offline?
templates.content: Of course! Now that your e-book is available to read on the Glose reading service, you can totally read it anytime, anywhere, through your Glose account. And you don't even have to download them! The only time you need to be online is when you first download an e-book you want to read.

templates.name: Bible Warranty and Replacement
templates.content: Our manufacturer's warranty provides coverage for defective bindings on hardcover, softcover, and Leather-LookTM and Italian Duo-Tone Bibles for four years and on bonded and top-grain leather Bibles for six years. This warranty doesn't apply to normal wear and tear. A lifetime warranty applies to defects within Bibles and books like missing pages, chapters, or books, collating errors and pages bound upside down. If your Bible meets these criteria, we'll replace it for you. You can find further instructions on how to request a replacement here: https://www.harpercollinschristian.com/p/2020/06/30/bible-warranty-and-replacement/

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Are Italian Duo-ToneTM and Leathersoft bindings genuine leather?
templates.content: These bindings are made from soft, supple, simulated leather. There is no real leather used in these bindings.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 2-3 business days and we usually ship via UPS or USPS. Once shipped, it will take 2-8 business days for domestic orders, and 3-4 weeks for APO/FPO.

templates.content: We offer UPS 2nd Day Air shipping at checkout.

templates.name: Bulk Discounts
templates.content: We do not offer any bulk discounts on Faith Gateway. However, there are bulk discounts for most items on our sister site, Church Source. Please look on churchsource.com, and you will find the bulk pricing toward the bottom of the product page.

templates.name: How to start a return?
templates.content: To start a return, write down the reason for sending the item back and include the packing slip. If you don't have the slip, provide your order number along with your name, address, and phone number on a separate sheet. Then, wrap the package securely and mail it to HarperCollins Christian Publishing Return Center, 2205 East Lincoln Way, La Porte, IN 46350.

templates.name: Can you retroactively apply a code to my order?
templates.content: Unfortunately, we can't apply a promo code after the order has been placed. Apologies for the inconvenience!
